segments.text: Okay , here's the lease . Read it over before you sign it . As you can see , the deposit is $ 300 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , okay . I can get it back when I move out , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , assuming there's been no damage to the apartment . Before you move in , you can make a list of any marks , scratches , and so forth that are already there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Here's the lease and the check for the deposit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . You can move in next Monday . Your first month's rent is due then .
segments.speaker: S1
